name: eMurder
description:
Going to your friend Ricky's party you and the guests are surprised to find him murdered in his bathroom. Luckily you have a solid alibi and can't be pinned with the murder, so it's up to you to figure out which one of these "friends" killed him.

For those who have completed the game who want a more...Thorough confession, you can find one here.

Collaborators:

Jesse Allas - Programmer

Annie Zhao - Programmer

James Bates - Writer/Designer

Elanna Tang - Artist

Johan Tan - Programmer
